data: It was towards the middle of a sweltering afternoon when Commandant Dom Erminio roused himself to wakefulness as he lay in his Madeira chair on the veranda of Fort San Roque, which stands beside a muddy river of Western Africa.
Madeira chair | Fort San Roque | Western Africa
veranda of Fort San Roque | muddy river of Western Africa
